Class Gamer

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              client.Gamer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Player, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
public class Gamer
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements Player

Gamer Object. The Player implementation for the Stein Client .

Version:
1.0
Author:
alex & runar

Constructor Detail

Gamer

protected Gamer(java.lang.String _name,
                Srv srv,
                org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell _shell,
                org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display _display)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException

Create a new Gamer instance by the given name, on the given Server, using the given Shell on the given Display.

Parameters:
_name - The name of the Gamer (Player) created.
srv - The Stein Server for this Gamer
_shell - The GUI this Gamer is using.
_display - The display the given Shell is using.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
